about_the_game:
(BEWARE! This DLC contains spoilers for the main game!)

Dive into the development of Rusted Moss with its in-depth 127-page companion guide! It contains pages of concept art, behind-the-scenes stories, and developer commentary that touches on its art, world-building, music, and development.

Interested to know more about the lore of the Rusted Moss world? The companion guide has character sheets of several characters you meet in the game as well as bits and pieces of their unexplored backstories.

The companion guide gives further insight into Rusted Moss' music, sharing the thought and direction behind its tracks. It also includes a piano scoresheet of Rusted Moss' final track, "Eglantine".

Developer comments and anecdotes are also scattered throughout the book. Learn about the thought process behind Rusted Moss' game design decisions and abandoned concepts.

name: Rusted Moss Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with at least 500MB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive into the development of Rusted Moss with its companion guide. It contains pages of concept art, behind-the-scenes stories, and developer commentary that touches on its art, world-building, music, and development.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
